Mr. Gopala Krishna is a demonstrated expert with over 25 years of information technology (IT) 
applied  expertise  and  proven  leadership  as  an:  Infrastructure  Engineering  and  Technology 
development  Lead,  Infrastructure  Operations  Manager,  Technology  Transformation/Transition 
Manager, Scrum Master, and Risk Manager.  This includes over 12 years of applied, phased IT 
Infrastructure  Engineering  Project  Management  (PM)  employing  initiation,  planning,  execution,

Manager, Scrum Master, and Risk Manager.  This includes over 12 years of applied, phased IT 
Infrastructure  Engineering  Project  Management  (PM)  employing  initiation,  planning,  execution, 
monitoring and controlling, and closure processes and standards across multiple domains (e.g., 
Insurance, Banking  Financial  Services,  Retail,  Life  Science,  and  Health  Care).    He  routinely 
engages  industry  accepted  and  customer-native  PM  practices  (e.g.  Agile,  Scrum,  Six  Sigma, 
Waterfall,  and  PMI/PMBOK)  as part  of  his  PM  Engineering  System  Development  Life  Cycle 
(SDLC)  practices.    Mr.  Peri  Venkata  is  also  a  recognized  Infrastructure  Engineering  PM  and 
Lead,   delivering  technology   transformation   across  the   operating  environment - Network, 
Security;  Firewall;  Storage;  Database;  Windows;  Application  Development;  Cloud  Migration 
(Azure, Amazon, Google, IBM and Adobe); Data Center migrations (e.g. ServiceNow, Servers,

Security;  Firewall;  Storage;  Database;  Windows;  Application  Development;  Cloud  Migration

He actively participates as a stakeholder in engineering Technology Roadmap development and 
project planning with his customers and tracks his Team’s projects.  He also facilitates contract 
management, material purchasing and staff assignments across all the service towers. Mr. Peri 
Venkata is both forward thinking and future leaning.  His vision is to constantly review and align 
with  his customer,  ensuring  the  IT  Operating  Environment  Engineering  efforts  are  viewed  with 
an  eye  on  cost-effective, high ROI technology transformation that addresses his Customer’s
